about.description:
The Open Knowledgebase of Interatomic Models (OpenKIM) aims to be an
online resource for standardized testing, long-term warehousing and
easy retrieval of interatomic models and data.
about.summary: The Open Knowledgebase of Interatomic Models (OpenKIM) aims to be an online resource for standardized testing, long-term warehousing and easy retrieval of interatomic models and data.

name: kim-api
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "kim-api" %}
{% set version = "2.1.3" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/openkim/{{ name }}/archive/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: d433ad8edebe29311da6f362ff65830785cb880b2152735bf62676a77e19bbb4

build:
  number: 2
  skip: true  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - {{ compiler('fortran') }}
    - cmake
    - make
    - vim
  run:
    - wget

test:
  commands:
    - kim-api-collections-management list

about:
  home: https://openkim.org
  license: CDDL-1.0
  license_family: OTHER
  license_file: LICENSE.CDDL
  summary: 'The Open Knowledgebase of Interatomic Models (OpenKIM) aims to be an online resource for standardized testing, long-term warehousing and easy retrieval of interatomic models and data. '

  description: |
    The Open Knowledgebase of Interatomic Models (OpenKIM) aims to be an 
    online resource for standardized testing, long-term warehousing and 
    easy retrieval of interatomic models and data. 
  doc_url: https://kim-api.readthedocs.io/
  dev_url: https://github.com/openkim/kim-api

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jan-janssen
